G

getContent() - Method in interface distributed.plugin.runtime.IMessage
Get a message content of message
getCurrentMessageCasualTime() - Method in class distributed.plugin.runtime.engine.Entity
Get current messages casual time
A message casual time is a sum of successive messages that has been caused by another message.
Example
msgA -> msgB -> msgC -> msgE
        msgB -> msgD -> msgF -> msgG
getInPorts() - Method in class distributed.plugin.runtime.engine.Entity
Get all incomming port labels of this entity
getLabel() - Method in interface distributed.plugin.runtime.IMessage
Get a message label of message
getName() - Method in class distributed.plugin.runtime.engine.Entity
Get a name of this entity
getOutPorts() - Method in class distributed.plugin.runtime.engine.Entity
Get all outgoing port label of this entity
getPorts() - Method in class distributed.plugin.runtime.engine.Entity
Get all local in and out port labels of this entity.
getState() - Method in class distributed.plugin.runtime.engine.Entity
Get a current state of this entity
getTime() - Method in class distributed.plugin.runtime.engine.Entity
Get a current simulation time unit, a time value starts from zero when the process is start running
